amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.para: Appellate review under this code shall be governed by section 30-1601.

annotation.para: Appeals of matters arising under the Nebraska Probate Code are reviewed for error on the record. In re Conservatorship of Estate of Martin, 228 Neb. 103, 421 N.W.2d 463 (1988).
